title: 2008 Chevy Avalanche LTZ 4x4
description:
Description

**ONE OWNER** **CREW CAB ROOM** **DVD** **NAVIGATION** **BACK UP CAMERA** **HEATED LEATHER** **POWER SUNROOF** **TOW PACKAGE**

Thanks to its practical convertible midgate configuration, the 2008 Chevrolet Avalanche LTZ 4X4 remains one of the most desirable crew-cab pickups for carrying a combination of passengers and cargo. The Avalanche features Versatile midgate-based body style, smooth ride, comfortable seating, and a capable engine.

This Avalanche is also equipped with Adjustable Pedals, Driver Memory, Power Seats, Power Options, Rear Air/Heat, and Bose Sound.

Powering the Avalanche is 5.3L V8 Engine. Fuel Economy clocks in at 14 MPG City and 19 MPG Hwy. Properly equipped, the Avalanche can Tow up to 8200 Pounds.

Standard Avalanche safety equipment includes antilock disc brakes, stability control, GM's OnStar emergency communications system and a full-length side-curtain airbag system with a rollover sensor. In government crash tests, the Avalanche earned a top five-star rating for protection of front occupants in head-on collisions.

Give us a call to schedule a test drive or if you have additional questions. Warranty available for purchase.

title: 2007 Ford Explorer Sport Trac Limited 4x4 V8
description:
Description

**CREW CAB ROOM** **V8 POWER** The 2007 Ford Explorer Sport Trac Limited 4x4 V8 is a compact truck/suv combination that features a Roomy cabin, strong V8, hidden storage compartments, and nice ride and handling balance.

This Sport Trac is equipped with composite cargo box, Heated Leather, power windows and mirrors, keyless entry, cruise control, air conditioning and CD player. The Limited Package adds color-keyed bumpers and side mirrors, foglamps, side-step bars, 18-inch wheels, a power driver seat, and leather wrapping for the steering wheel and gearshift knob are thrown into the mix.

This Sport Trac is powered by a 4.6-liter V8 rated for 292 hp and 300 lb-ft of torque. The Control Trac four-wheel-drive system has three modes. Intended for everyday driving, 4x4 Auto mode routes power only to the rear wheels until they slip, at which point power is delivered automatically to the front wheels. The 4x4 High mode provides a 50/50 power split to the front and rear wheels, making it ideal for off-road or severe winter conditions. The 4x4 Low mode locks the transfer case and is for the really deep stuff, steep grades and pulling a boat out of the water. Fuel Economy clocks in at 13 MPG City and 18 MPG Hwy. Properly outfitted, the 2007 Explorer Sport Trac can pull up to 6,800 pounds.

Antilock disc brakes, stability control, front-seat side airbags and a tire pressure monitor are all standard.

Give us a call to schedule a test drive or if you have additional questions. Warranty available for purchase.

description:
Description

**NEW TIRES** **CREW CAB ROOM** **HEATED LEATHER** **POWER SUNROOF** **TOW PACKAGE**

Thanks to its nifty convertible midgate, the 2007 Chevrolet Avalanche LTZ 4X4 is the most versatile crew-cab pickup on the market when it comes to carrying a mix of passengers and cargo. The Avalanche features Versatile midgate-based body configuration, comfortable ride and seating, and a smooth V8 engine.

This Avalanche is also equipped with Adjustable Pedals, Driver Memory, Power Seats, Bose Sound, Rear Heat/Air, and Power Options.

Powering the Avalanche is a 5.3-liter V8 and a four-speed automatic transmission. The 5.3-liter engine is good for 310 horsepower and 335 pound-feet of torque. Fuel Economy clocks in at 14 MPG City and 19 MPG Hwy. Properly equipped, a 4WD Avalanche can tow 8,200 pounds.

Standard safety equipment includes antilock brakes, stability control, a tire-pressure monitor and GM's OnStar emergency communications system. A full-length side curtain airbag system with a rollover sensor is included with the LTZ package.

Give us a call to schedule a test drive or if you have additional questions. Warranty available for purchase.

title: 2008 Cadillac Escalade EXT AWD with Ultra Luxury Package
description:
Description

**CREW CAB ROOM** **DVD** **NAVIGATION** **HEATED/COOLED LEATHER** **POWER SUNROOF** **BACK UP CAMERA** **TOW PACKAGE**

the 2008 Cadillac Escalade EXT's authoritative styling, powerful V8 and impressive combination of passenger and cargo room give it undeniable appeal in the Luxury-themed pickup truck segment. The escalade features Strong and smooth powertrain, pleasant ride, handsome cabin, versatile cargo area.

Standard equipment includes an adaptive suspension, 18-inch alloy wheels, xenon headlights, roof rack, heated and power-adjustable front seats, heated rear seats, leather upholstery, wood-grain trim, tri-zone automatic climate control, an eight-speaker Bose audio system with an MP3-capable CD/DVD changer, rear parking sensors, remote start and OnStar. With the Ultra Luxury Package you get 22-inch chrome wheels, automatic high-beam headlights, a navigation system, a rear back-up camera, cooled front seats and a heated steering wheel. A sunroof is also included in the package.

Powering the Escalade EXT is is a muscular 6.2-liter V8 that develops 403 hp and 417 pound-feet of torque. A six-speed automatic transmission is standard and includes a tow/haul mode. Fuel Economy clocks in at 12 MPG City and 18 MPG Hwy. Thanks to standard trailering preparation, the EXT can tow a maximum of 7,600 pounds.

Standard are antilock disc brakes, stability control and full-length side curtain airbags. In addition to offering protection in side-impact and rollover incidents, the curtain bags can also inflate in serious frontal-impact collisions to provide additional protection. In rear-impact collisions, the front seatbelt pre-tensioners automatically activate to help front-seat occupants avoid whiplash.

Give us a call to schedule a test drive or if you have additional questions. Warranty available for purchase.

In rear-impact collisions, the front seatbelt pre-tensioners automatically activate to help front-seat occupants avoid whiplash.

Give us a call to schedule a test drive or if you have additional questions. Warranty available for purchase.
